# excludes.txt
(?s)```.*?```          # code blocks
`[^`]+`                # inline code
^EXEC\s+.*$            # SQL commands
^sp_rename\s+.*$
!\[.*?\]\(.*?\)        # images
<figure>.*</figure>
^images/
^assets/
\[.*?\]\(.*?\)         # links
https?://\S+
\w+\.(jpg|png|gif|pdf|docx|xlsx|zip)$  # filenames
